title: Is Blockchain a fad, or the future?
description: Paul Vigna, Wall Street Journal reporter and co-author of "The Truth Machine" joins Chuck to talk about Blockchain, bitcoin, and the future of cryptocurrency.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
